text: Douglas Sessions '05 is an album by Boston-based rock group The Lights Out. It was self-released in 2005. ==Track listing== # "Pride and Shame" # "Cant" # "Sorry for Saying I'm Sorry" # "Western Pariah" # "Hostile Takeover" # "If I Had a Hi Fi" # "100 Hours in L.A." # "Time for Moving On" # "Pink and Purple" # "Wrong as I can Be" # "Redshift Blues" Category:2005 albums Category:The Lights Out albums
title: Douglas Sessions '05
